titleStmt.title: The vertues of that well-known and often experienced medicine Fletcher's powder
titleStmt.author: Fletcher, R. (Richard), fl. 1676-1677.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. James for the author,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Fletcher by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Imperfect: faded and stained, with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
